<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong data-stringify-type="bold" style="color:#000">Good morning.</strong> Lots of music festival news lately—Outside Lands opened ticket sales for October, while Coachella and Stagecoach are reportedly delayed until 2022. <span class="c-mrkdwn__br" data-stringify-type="paragraph-break"></span>Cannot wait to reintroduce ourselves to the world of sweaty strangers, undercooked tacos, and $15 water.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But before that, scroll down for one of the best Follow Fridays yet. </p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FINANCE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/spacs-post-record-q1-exceed-2020-dealmaking-total?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Goldman Sachs Finds Out How Much Is Too Much
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/spacs-post-record-q1-exceed-2020-dealmaking-total" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="An illustration of a black chair at a white office desk in front of a teal background; on the desk is a phone, stack of notebooks, and pillow." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDMyL3dvcmthaG9saWMuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Goldman Sachs bankers have become a little too familiar with their Zoom reflection. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In a <a href="https://assets.bwbx.io/documents/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/rSEzNw9cve9E/v0?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">survey</a> circulated to managers, 13 analysts in Goldman's investment banking division reported sharply deteriorating mental and physical health from working almost 100 hours/week in what one described as "inhumane" conditions.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>They asked managers to cap their hours at 80/week, allow more time to prepare for client and team meetings, and guarantee Friday nights and Saturdays off (unless there's a pre-approved exception). </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>If conditions don't improve, analysts said there's only a 35% chance they'll still be at Goldman in six months. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A spokesperson <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/03/18/goldman-sachs-junior-bankers-complain-of-crushing-work-load-amid-spac-fueled-boom-in-wall-street-deals.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> the bank is listening and trying to address concerns, including by hiring more junior bankers and transferring some employees to help. But execs probably don't want to address the root problem.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Business is reallllly good </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Wall Streeters know they're accepting heavy workloads in exchange for a salary that keeps their seat warm at Nobu. But the recent explosion in dealmaking has been more than some bargained for. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The global IPO market has had a record Q1, with 600+ issuers <a href="https://finance.yahoo.com/news/global-ipo-market-eyes-record-000000655.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">raising</a> over $162 billion, according to Bloomberg. And you already know what's driving it.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">SPACs.</strong> IPOs of special purpose acquisition companies have <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/spac-usa-ipo/u-s-spacs-overtake-2020-haul-in-less-than-three-months-idUSL8N2LD6VN?edition-redirect=in&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">raised</a> over $83 billion this quarter, eclipsing 2020’s entire haul. As a leading merger advisor, Goldman is raking in business. It's <a href="https://www.businessinsider.com/investment-banks-most-spac-ipos-citigroup-goldman-credit-suisse-2021-3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">advised</a> 32 SPACs in Q1 for $9.2 billion in proceeds, according to Refinitiv data. Only Citigroup's got it beat with 56 SPAC IPOs for $10.5 billion. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">CFO Stephen Scherr says Goldman's deals backlog is at a record high. In the market, over 400 SPACs with $131 billion in cash <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-12/blank-check-mergers-grabbing-ever-bigger-slice-of-m-a-market?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">are looking</a> for companies to merge with. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> As SPACs continue to IPO with huge valuations, analysts are worried about market "indigestion." Shorts against SPACs have more than tripled since the start of the year to $2.8 billion, according to data from S3. And the SEC recently <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-10/sec-warns-investors-about-buying-spacs-endorsed-by-celebrities?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">warned</a> investors to treat celebrities' SPACs with the same skepticism as their Proactiv commercials.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPORTS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/nfl-inks-huge-new-media-deals?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Thinking About the NFL's New TV Deal
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/nfl-inks-huge-new-media-deals" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="The Weeknd meme" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDM3L3RoZV93ZWVrbmRfbWVtZS5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The NFL just announced new media rights deals that make the Patriots’ free agency spending spree seem like a trip to Nordstrom Rack.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The league will <a href="https://apnews.com/article/nfl-football-super-bowl-coronavirus-pandemic-80681ad1409adf958708f65560c91da4?utm_source=Twitter&utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_medium=AP_NFL&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nearly double</a> its media revenues to a reported $113 billion over 11 seasons, flexing its position as the undisputed king of the TV castle. The new deals will start up in 2023. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The details: </strong>Several of the NFL’s media partners (including CBS and NBC) will keep their current schedule. But there are some important changes.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Amazon gained exclusive rights to broadcast Thursday Night Football on its Prime Video service. It’s the first time a streaming service has been granted an exclusive package of NFL games.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Disney’s ABC notched a few more games, including the biggest one of all: It’ll be included in the rotation to air the Super Bowl.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>“The new contracts show the balance the league is trying to strike by embracing digital platforms, as younger audiences migrate to them, without alienating fans used to watching games on TV,” <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/nfl-feeds-streaming-platforms-with-media-deals-valued-at-over-100-billion-11616097902?reflink=desktopwebshare_twitter&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">writes the WSJ</a>. NFL viewership declined 7% last season. </p>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top: 12px;">

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SUPPLY CHAIN
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/supply-chains-need-factory-reset?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Supply Chains Need a Factory Reset
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/supply-chains-need-factory-reset" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="TOPSHOT - This photo taken on March 23, 2020 shows employees wearing fac..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDMwL3RvcHNob3QtY2hpbmEtaGVhbHRoLXZpcnUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Str/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The global economy relies on a highly intricate system that brings raw materials to places at precisely the moment when they're required.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Like your social skills, that system is completely <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/everywhere-you-look-the-global-supply-chain-is-a-mess-11616019081?mod=hp_lead_pos3&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">out of whack</a> right now, reports the WSJ.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">You know about the pandemic-induced <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/02/24/biden-addresses-global-semiconductor-chip-shortage-executive-order?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">chip shortage</a>—but manufacturers are also lacking other materials. This week, Toyota and Honda said they're <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-autos-toyota/toyota-honda-cut-north-america-production-amid-supply-chain-woes-idUSKBN2B92BV?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">cutting production</a> in North America because they don’t have enough petrochemicals.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The deep freeze that hit Texas in February knocked many chemical plants out of commission, and they won't be fully firing again for at least a few months.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Without chemicals, it's hard to create plastic. Now, a </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/one-week-texas-freeze-seen-triggering-monthslong-plastics-shortage-11615973401?mod=business_lead_pos7&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">plastic shortage</a></span><span> is causing headaches for companies making smartphones, medical equipment, and siding for houses. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Got room for one more? How about a <a href="https://qz.com/1985276/america-is-running-short-of-wood/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">wood shortage</a>. Demand for lumber by home builders has outstripped supply to the point where prices have shot up more than 180% since last spring. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>There isn't one primary driver of supply chain chaos—it's simply a series of unfortunate events.  </p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GRAB BAG
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/key-performance-indicators-march-19?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Key Performance Indicators
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/key-performance-indicators-march-19" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Drought in California" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDM2L2Ryb3VnaHRfaW5fY2FsaWZvcm5pYS5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Stephen Lam/The San Francisco Chronicle via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat: </strong>Nearly half the US is in at least a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/03/18/nearly-half-the-us-is-in-drought-thats-expected-to-grow-worse-noaa.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">moderate drought</a> right now, according to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. Affecting roughly 74 million Americans, particularly in the Southwest, it's the worst spring drought since 2013.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote: </strong>"God bless America."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Ontario Premier Doug Ford was seeing stars and stripes when he heard that the Biden administration is <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-18/-god-bless-america-ontario-premier-says-of-biden-vaccine-plan?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sending 1.5 million doses</a> of the AstraZeneca vaccine to Canada, where the vaccine rollout has been slow due to a supply shortage. With shipments also headed to Mexico, this is the first time the US is sending vaccines abroad. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Read: </strong>Should we bring back the World's Fair? (<a href="https://www.cameronwiese.com/blog/worlds-fair?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Cameron Wiese</a>)</p>

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENTERTAINMENT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/super-nintendo-world-opens-osaka?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
No Longer a Warp Pipe Dream
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/03/18/super-nintendo-world-opens-osaka" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="In this picture taken on March 17, 2021, fans of Universal Studio Japan ..." style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC80NDMxL2phcGFuLWVudGVydGFpbm1lbnQtbmludGUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Philip Fong/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">After years of fan requests and months of Covid-related delays, Super Nintendo World opened at Universal Studios Japan in Osaka on Wednesday. Mario creator Shigeru Miyamoto oversaw the park's design himself, and it shows in the details: </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>A Mario Kart-themed augmented reality ride</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Wearable Power Up wristbands that trigger mini-games throughout the park </span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Mushroom Cream popcorn (when in the Mushroom Kingdom…)</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The park plans to observe all Covid-era safety protocols: social distancing, masks, and limited occupancy. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why now? </strong>Japan's vaccine rollout is <a href="https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2021/03/17/national/soe-tokyo-lifting-suga/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">speeding up</a> and, elsewhere in the country, Tokyo is lifting its state of emergency Monday. Unfortunately for stateside Nintendo fans, Orlando's version of the park is <a href="https://www.polygon.com/22332587/super-nintendo-world-ride-through-videos-japan?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">still delayed</a> until 2025, but you can virtually tour the attractions in Osaka <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cv_E2dSTHw4&list=PLy9eoiZLpVdIB_HEfawrE6qGXm935KAbO&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">on YouTube</a>.</p>

style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGoldman Sachs bankers have become a little too familiar with their Zoom reflection. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIn a \u003ca href=\"https://assets.bwbx.io/documents/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/rSEzNw9cve9E/v0?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esurvey\u003c/a\u003e circulated to managers, 13 analysts in Goldman's investment banking division reported sharply deteriorating mental and physical health from working almost 100 hours/week in what one described as \"inhumane\" conditions.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThey asked managers to cap their hours at 80/week, allow more time to prepare for client and team meetings, and guarantee Friday nights and Saturdays off (unless there's a pre-approved exception). \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIf conditions don't improve, analysts said there's only a 35% chance they'll still be at Goldman in six months. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eA spokesperson \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/03/18/goldman-sachs-junior-bankers-complain-of-crushing-work-load-amid-spac-fueled-boom-in-wall-street-deals.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e the bank is listening and trying to address concerns, including by hiring more junior bankers and transferring some employees to help. But execs probably don't want to address the root problem.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eBusiness is reallllly good \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWall Streeters know they're accepting heavy workloads in exchange for a salary that keeps their seat warm at Nobu. But the recent explosion in dealmaking has been more than some bargained for. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe global IPO market has had a record Q1, with 600+ issuers \u003ca href=\"https://finance.yahoo.com/news/global-ipo-market-eyes-record-000000655.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eraising\u003c/a\u003e over $162 billion, according to Bloomberg. And you already know what's driving it.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSPACs.\u003c/strong\u003e IPOs of special purpose acquisition companies have \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/spac-usa-ipo/u-s-spacs-overtake-2020-haul-in-less-than-three-months-idUSL8N2LD6VN?edition-redirect=in\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eraised\u003c/a\u003e over $83 billion this quarter, eclipsing 2020’s entire haul. As a leading merger advisor, Goldman is raking in business. It's \u003ca href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investment-banks-most-spac-ipos-citigroup-goldman-credit-suisse-2021-3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eadvised\u003c/a\u003e 32 SPACs in Q1 for $9.2 billion in proceeds, according to Refinitiv data. Only Citigroup's got it beat with 56 SPAC IPOs for $10.5 billion. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCFO Stephen Scherr says Goldman's deals backlog is at a record high. In the market, over 400 SPACs with $131 billion in cash \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-12/blank-check-mergers-grabbing-ever-bigger-slice-of-m-a-market?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eare looking\u003c/a\u003e for companies to merge with. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e As SPACs continue to IPO with huge valuations, analysts are worried about market \"indigestion.\" Shorts against SPACs have more than tripled since the start of the year to $2.8 billion, according to data from S3. And the SEC recently \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-03-10/sec-warns-investors-about-buying-spacs-endorsed-by-celebrities?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewarned\u003c/a\u003e investors to treat celebrities' SPACs with the same skepticism as their Proactiv commercials.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: billion over 11 seasons, flexing its position as the undisputed king of the TV castle. The new deals will start up in 2023. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe details: \u003c/strong\u003eSeveral of the NFL’s media partners (including CBS and NBC) will keep their current schedule. But there are some important changes.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAmazon gained exclusive rights to broadcast Thursday Night Football on its Prime Video service. It’s the first time a streaming service has been granted an exclusive package of NFL games.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eDisney’s ABC notched a few more games, including the biggest one of all: It’ll be included in the rotation to air the Super Bowl.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003e“The new contracts show the balance the league is trying to strike by embracing digital platforms, as younger audiences migrate to them, without alienating fans used to watching games on TV,” \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/nfl-feeds-streaming-platforms-with-media-deals-valued-at-over-100-billion-11616097902?reflink=desktopwebshare_twitter\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewrites the WSJ\u003c/a\u003e. collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAfter years of fan requests and months of Covid-related delays, Super Nintendo World opened at Universal Studios Japan in Osaka on Wednesday. Mario creator Shigeru Miyamoto oversaw the park's design himself, and it shows in the details: \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eA Mario Kart-themed augmented reality ride\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eWearable Power Up wristbands that trigger mini-games throughout the park \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eMushroom Cream popcorn (when in the Mushroom Kingdom…)\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe park plans to observe all Covid-era safety protocols: social distancing, masks, and limited occupancy. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy now? \u003c/strong\u003eJapan's vaccine rollout is \u003ca href=\"https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2021/03/17/national/soe-tokyo-lifting-suga/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003espeeding up\u003c/a\u003e and, elsewhere in the country, Tokyo is lifting its state of emergency Monday. Unfortunately for stateside Nintendo fans, Orlando's version of the park is \u003ca href=\"https://www.polygon.com/22332587/super-nintendo-world-ride-through-videos-japan?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estill delayed\u003c/a\u003e until 2025, but you can virtually tour the
